titlestmt.subtitle: Athletic Game Films Collection

address.addressline: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.repository: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.persname: University of Connecticut. Division of Athletics.

did.unittitle: University of Connecticut, Athletic Game Films Collection.
did.abstract: The collection contains moving image recordings (in multiple formats) of University athletic games throughout the 20th century.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The University of Connecticut Division of Athletics oversees and organizes both men's and woman's sports.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains approxomately seversl hundred reels of 16mm film, VHS video and betacam tapes that document some of the intercollegiate competitions of the University of Connecticut's football, basketball, soccer, tennis, archery, and track teams which date from circa 1930-1998. Many of the games were filmed and developed by Jerauld A. Manter, a UConn faculty member.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by format and chronologically therein.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to the University, its history, administration, faculty, staff, and students. Realted materaisl may also be found in the sport media guides (Dodd periodicals) and programs and in the Athletic Communications Office Records. For detailed information about this collection please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This record series is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to media is by appointment only.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#] University of Connecticut, Athletic Game Film Collection. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Materials in the collection have been transfered to the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center from the Division of Athletics periodically beginning in the mid 1980s.
